product_details.name: THPRE X Pre-Workout + Creatine Stack: Ultimate Performance Bundle
product_details.description:
• ✅ THPRE X Pre-Workout: Rocket Candy Flavor - 20 Power-Packed Servings
• ✅ Premium Micronized Creatine Monohydrate by Nutrabay Pure - 33 Servings
• ✅ Lab-Tested & Certified Pre-Workout Formula for Maximum Energy
• ✅ Contains 3g Per Serving of Pure Micronized Creatine
• ✅ Nutraceutical Grade Supplements for Enhanced Performance
• ✅ Perfect Stack for Strength, Energy & Muscle Growth
• ✅ Made in India with Premium Quality Standards
• ✅ Zero Artificial Colors in Creatine Formula
• ✅ Delicious Rocket Candy Flavor Pre-Workout for Enjoyable Consumption
• ✅ Ideal for Both Beginners and Advanced Fitness Enthusiasts

banner_details:
The banner is a highly energetic promotional layout designed to advertise a performance supplement bundle. The central focus is a visually impactful product image (`product_image`) featuring two supplements prominently displayed against a dynamic circular gradient backdrop. The top portion features a large, bold main heading (`heading`) in a vibrant yellow, contrasted by a crisp white subheading (`subheading`) placed directly beneath it. A circular yellow price tag (`price_background`) highlights the special offer, accentuated by dynamic typography (`price`). Supporting text (`description`) at the bottom lists the key product qualities, while a bold yellow rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`) invites viewers to take action. The background includes subtle geometric and abstract vector graphics, adding depth and energy while maintaining balance and modern appeal.

Color Palette:
- Deep Navy Blue: #0B2F5E
- Bright Yellow: #FFD100
- Soft White: #FFFFFF
- Gradient Accent Yellow: #FFA000
- Electric Blue: #1E88E5
product_color: The product image features a bold, energetic color palette ideal for fitness and supplement branding. Dominant colors include electric blue (#00AEEF), vibrant yellow (#FFD700), deep black (#000000), and crisp white (#FFFFFF), perfectly complemented by teal green (#3ED5C3) on the creatine pack. The blue gradient background creates depth and movement, transitioning from light to dark shades, amplifying the intensity of the yellow "X" which is bordered with black for contrast. White and black typography ensure legibility and highlight essential details. Teal is used sparingly but effectively to unify the dual packaging, making these colors ideal for an attention-grabbing advertisement banner.
